body:
Hi All,

The community that has developed through radiance-online.org is really
remarkable. There is a huge amount of knowledge and talent available
here. I think that Peter's work over the years to develop, maintain and
support radiance-online.org has played a huge role in revitalizing and
invigorating the Radiance community, we all owe him significant
gratitude for this. Thanks Peter!

Best,

-Jack de Valpine

Gregory J. Ward wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] moving hardware
